Description:
-------------
Hello Kitty Seasons will challenge players to create a character and guide the development of a colorful city populated by adorable Sanrio characters such as Hello Kitty, My Melody, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru, Little Twin Stars and Chococat. Players will create a community around so unlock new levels and a greater variety of adventures, all while enjoying fun and exciting mini-games.
